analyzed: yatas bhyudaya niḥśreyasa siddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ

original: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśaṃ kālo dig ātmā mana iti dravyāṇi / KVs_1,1.4 /
analyzed: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam kālaḥ diś ātmā manaḥ iti dravyāṇi

original: rūparasagandhasparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhayaḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś ca guṇāḥ /
analyzed: rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvam saṃyoga vibhāgau paratva aparatve buddhayaḥ sukha duḥkhe icchā dveṣau prayatnaḥ ca guṇāḥ

original: utkṣepaṇam avakṣepaṇam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ gamanam iti karmāṇi / KVs_1,1.6 /
analyzed: utkṣepaṇam avakṣepaṇam ākuñcanam prasāraṇam gamanam iti karmāṇi

original: sad anityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavad iti dravyaguṇakarmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ / KVs_1,1.7 /
analyzed: sat anityam dravyavat kāryam kāraṇam sāmānya viśeṣa vat iti dravya guṇa karmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ  /
kārya avirodhi dravyam kāraṇa avirodhi ca

original: kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇam iti dravyalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.14 /
analyzed: kriyāvat guṇavat samavāyi kāraṇam iti dravya lakṣaṇam

original: dravyāśrayy aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.15 /
analyzed: dravya āśrayī aguṇavān saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu akāraṇam anapekṣaḥ iti guṇa lakṣaṇam  /

original: ekadravyam aguṇaṃ saṃyogavibhāgeṣv anapekṣaṃ kāraṇam iti karmalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.16 /
analyzed: eka dravyam aguṇam saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu anapekṣam kāraṇam iti karma lakṣaṇam
dravya guṇa karmaṇām dravyam kāraṇam sāmānyam

original: dvitvaprabhṛtayaś ca saṃkhyāḥ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgāś ca / KVs_1,1.23 /
analyzed: dvi tva prabhṛtayaḥ ca saṃkhyāḥ pṛthak tvam saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ ca

original: asamavāyāt sāmānyaṃ karma kāryaṃ na vidyate / KVs_1,1.24 /
analyzed: asamavāyāt sāmānyam karma kāryam na vidyate  /
kāraṇa sāmānye dravya karmaṇām karma akāraṇam uktam
na tu kārya abhavāt kāraṇa abhāvaḥ

original: dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāś ca / KVs_1,2.5 /
analyzed: dravya tvam guṇa tvam karma tvam ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāḥ ca
sat iti yatas dravya guṇa karmasu
dravya guṇa karmabhyaḥ rtha antaram sattā

original: guṇakarmasu ca bhāvān na karma na guṇaḥ / KVs_1,2.10 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu ca bhāvāt na karma na guṇaḥ
eka dravyavat tvena dravya tvam uktam  /
sat liṅga aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca ekaḥ bhāvaḥ  /

original: rūparasasparśavatya āpo dravāḥ snigdhāś ca / KVs_2,1.2 /
analyzed: rūpa rasa sparśavatyaḥ āpaḥ dravāḥ snigdhāḥ ca

original: sarpirjatumadhūcchiṣṭānāṃ pārthivānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam / KVs_2,1.6 /
analyzed: sarpiḥ jatu madhūcchiṣṭānām pārthivānām agni saṃyogāt drava tā adbhiḥ sāmānyam

original: trapusīsaloharajatasuvarṇānāṃ taijasānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam / KVs_2,1.7 /
analyzed: trapu sīsa loha rajata suvarṇānām taijasānām agni saṃyogāt drava tā adbhiḥ sāmānyam

original: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti gotve dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgam / KVs_2,1.8 /
analyzed: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti go tve dṛṣṭam liṅgam  /

original: na ca dṛṣṭānāṃ sparśa ity adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuḥ / KVs_2,1.10 /
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭānām sparśaḥ iti adṛṣṭa liṅgaḥ vāyuḥ  /
adravyavat tvena nitya tvam uktam cbhvā

original: vāyor iti sati snnikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_2,1.15 /
analyzed: vāyoḥ iti sati snnikarṣe pratyakṣa abhāvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgam na vidyate  /
saṃjñā karma tu asmad viśiṣtānām liṅgam

original: niṣkramaṇaṃ praveśanam ity ākāśasya liṅgam / KVs_2,1.20 /

analyzed: tat aliṅgam eka dravyavat tvāt karmaṇaḥ  /

original: kāraṇaguṇapūrvaḥ kārye guṇo dṛṣṭaḥ kāryāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca śabdaḥ sparśavatām aguṇaḥ / KVs_2,1.24 /
analyzed: kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaḥ kārye guṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kārya antara aprādurbhāvāt ca śabdaḥ sparśavatām aguṇaḥ  /

original: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣatvāc ca nātmaguṇo na manoguṇaḥ / KVs_2,1.25 /
analyzed: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣa tvāt ca na ātma guṇaḥ na manaḥ guṇaḥ  /
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: puṣpavastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe gandhāntarāprādurbhāvo vastre gandhābhāvaliṅgam / KVs_2,2.1 /
analyzed: puṣpa vastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe gandha antara aprādurbhāvaḥ vastre gandha abhāva liṅgam  /

original: aparasmin paraṃ yugapad ayugapac ciraṃ kṣipram iti kālaliṅgāni / KVs_2,2.6 /
analyzed: aparasmin param yugapad ayugapad ciram kṣipram iti kāla liṅgāni
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: ita idam iti yatas tad diśo liṅgam / KVs_2,2.12 /
analyzed: itas idam iti yatas tat diśaḥ liṅgam  /
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: ādityasaṃyogād bhūtapūrvād bhaviṣyato bhūtāc ca prācī / KVs_2,2.16 /
analyzed: āditya saṃyogāt bhūta pūrvāt bhaviṣyataḥ bhūtāt ca prācī  /

original: tathā dakṣiṇā pratīcy udīci ca / KVs_2,2.17 /
sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca saṃśayaḥ / KVs_2,2.19 /
analyzed: sāmānya pratyakṣāt viśeṣa apratyakṣāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ
dṛṣṭam yathādṛṣṭām a yathādṛṣṭām ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
śrotra grahaṇaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ sa śabdaḥ

original: tasmin dravyaṃ karma guṇa iti saṃśayaḥ / KVs_2,2.25 /
analyzed: tasmin dravyam karma guṇaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ

original: tulyajātīyeṣv arthāntarabhūteṣu ca viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt / KVs_2,2.26 /
analyzed: tulya jātīyeṣu artha antara bhūteṣu ca viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: saṃyogād vibhāgāc chabdāc ca śabdaniṣpatteḥ / KVs_2,2.36 /
analyzed: saṃyogāt vibhāgāt śabdāt ca śabda niṣpatteḥ
indriya artha prasiddhiḥ indriya arthebhyaḥ rtha antara tve hetuḥ

original: anya eva hetur ity anapadeśaḥ / KVs_3,1.7 /

analyzed: saṃyogi samavāyi eka artha samavāyi virodhi ca

original: viṣāṇī tasmād aśvo viṣāṇī tasmād gaur iti ca / KVs_3,1.12 /
analyzed: viṣāṇī tasmāt aśvaḥ viṣāṇī tasmāt gauḥ iti ca

original: ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣād yan niṣpadyate tad anyat / KVs_3,1.13 /
analyzed: ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt yat niṣpadyate tat anyat

original: pravṛttinivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam / KVs_3,1.14 /
analyzed: pravṛtti nivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam

original: ātmendriyārthasannikarṣe jñānasyābhāvo bhāvaś ca manaso liṅgam / KVs_3,2.1 /
analyzed: ātma indriya artha sannikarṣe jñānasya abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgam  /
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /
prayatna ayaugapadyāt jñāna ayaugapadyāt ca ekam manaḥ  /

original: prāṇāpānanimeṣonmeṣajīvanamanogatīndriyāntaravikārāḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś cety ātmaliṅgāni / KVs_3,2.4 /
analyzed: prāṇa apāna nimeṣa unmeṣa jīvana manaḥ gati indriya antara vikārāḥ sukha duḥkhe icchā dveṣau prayatnaḥ ca iti ātma liṅgāni  /
dravya tva nitya tve vāyunā vyākhyāte  /

original: yajñadatta iti sati sannikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_3,2.6 /
analyzed: yajñadattaḥ iti sati sannikarṣe pratyakṣa abhāvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgam na vidyate  /
aham iti śabda vyatirekāt na āgamikam

original: yadi ca dṛṣṭapratyakṣo 'haṃ devadatto 'haṃ yajñadatta iti / KVs_3,2.10 /
analyzed: yadi ca dṛṣṭa pratyakṣaḥ ham devadattaḥ ham yajñadattaḥ iti

original: devadatto gacchati viṣṇumitro gacchatīti copacārāc charīrapratyakṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.11 /
analyzed: devadattaḥ gacchati viṣṇumitraḥ gacchati iti ca upacārāt śarīra pratyakṣaḥ  /

original: aham iti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratrābhāvād arthāntarapratyakṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.13 /
analyzed: aham iti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratra abhāvāt artha antara pratyakṣaḥ

original: na tu śarīraviśeṣād yajñadattaviṣṇumitrayor jñānaviśeṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.14 /
analyzed: na tu śarīra viśeṣāt yajñadatta viṣṇumitrayoḥ jñāna viśeṣaḥ
sukha duḥkha jñāna niṣpatti aviśeṣāt aikātmyam
anityam iti ca viśeṣa pratiṣedha bhāvaḥ
mahatī aneka dravyavat tvāt rūpāt ca upalabdhiḥ

original: anekadravyeṇa dravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhiḥ / KVs_4,1.9 /
analyzed: aneka dravyeṇa dravyeṇa samavāyāt rūpa viśeṣāt ca upalabdhiḥ
etena rasa gandha sparśeṣu jñānam vyākhyātam

original: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma ca rūpidravyasamavāyāc cākṣuṣāṇi / KVs_4,1.12 /
analyzed: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvam saṃyoga vibhāgau paratva aparatve karma ca rūpi dravya samavāyāt cākṣuṣāṇi  /

original: etena guṇatve bhāve ca sarvendriyajñānaṃ vyākhyātam / KVs_4,1.14 /
analyzed: etena guṇa tve bhāve ca sarva indriya jñānam vyākhyātam

original: pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇām apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate / KVs_4,2.1 /
analyzed: pratyakṣa apratyakṣāṇām apratyakṣa tvāt saṃyogasya pañca ātmakam na vidyate

original: guṇāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca tryātmakam api na / KVs_4,2.2 /
analyzed: guṇa antara aprādurbhāvāt ca tri ātmakam api na

original: ātmasaṃyogas tv avipratiṣiddho mithaḥ pañcānām / KVs_4,2.3 /
analyzed: ātma saṃyogaḥ tu a vipratiṣiddhaḥ mithas pañcānām
santi a yoni jāḥ veda liṅgāt ca
tathā musala karma hasta saṃyogāt ca

original: abhighātaje musalakarmaṇi vyatirekād akāraṇaṃ hastasaṃyogaḥ / KVs_5,1.3 /
analyzed: abhighāta je musala karmaṇi vyatirekāt akāraṇam hasta saṃyogaḥ
tathā ātma saṃyogaḥ hasta musala karmaṇi

original: musalābhighātāt tu musalasaṃyogād dhaste karma / KVs_5,1.5 /
analyzed: musala abhighātāt tu musala saṃyogāt haste karma  /
tathā ātma karma hasta saṃyogāt ca

original: nodanaviśeṣābhāvād nordhvaṃ na tiryag gamanam / KVs_5,1.8 /
analyzed: nodana viśeṣa abhāvāt na ūrdhvam na tiryak gamanam
prayatna abhāve guru tvāt suptasya patanam
maṇi gamanam sūci abhisarpaṇam iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni

original: iṣāv ayugapat saṃyogaviśeṣāḥ karmānyatve hetuḥ / KVs_5,1.16 /
analyzed: iṣau ayugapad saṃyoga viśeṣāḥ karma anya tve hetuḥ  /

original: nodanād ādyam iṣoḥ karma karmakāritāc ca saṃskārād uttaraṃ tathottaram uttaraṃ ca / KVs_5,1.17 /
analyzed: nodanāt ādyam iṣoḥ karma karma kāritāt ca saṃskārāt uttaram tathā uttaram uttaram ca  /

original: nodanād abhighātāt saṃyuktasaṃyogāc ca pṛthivyāṃ karma / KVs_5,2.1 /
analyzed: nodanāt abhighātāt saṃyukta saṃyogāt ca pṛthivyām karma
apām saṃyoga abhāve guru tvāt patanam

original: apāṃ saṅghāto vilayanaṃ ca tejasaḥ saṃyogāt / KVs_5,2.9 /
analyzed: apām saṅghātaḥ vilayanam ca tejasaḥ saṃyogāt

original: apāṃ saṃyogād vibhāgāc ca stanayitnuḥ / KVs_5,2.12 /
pṛthivīkarmaṇā tejaḥkarma vāyukarma ca vyākhyātam / KVs_5,2.13 /
analyzed: pṛthivī karmaṇā tejaḥ karma vāyu karma ca vyākhyātam

original: agner ūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyoś ca tiryagpavanam aṇumanasoś cādyaṃ karmety adṛṣṭakāritāni / KVs_5,2.14 /
analyzed: agneḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ ca tiryak pavanam aṇu manasoḥ ca ādyam karma iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni  /
ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt sukha duḥkhe tad anārambhaḥ

original: ātmasthe manasi saśarīrasya sukhaduḥkhābhāvaḥ sa yogaḥ / KVs_5,2.17 /
analyzed: ātma sthe manasi sa śarīrasya sukha duḥkha abhāvaḥ sa yogaḥ

original: apasarpaṇam upasarpaṇam aśitapītasaṃyogaḥ kāryāntarasaṃyogāś cety adṛṣṭakāritāni / KVs_5,2.19 /
analyzed: apasarpaṇam upasarpaṇam aśita pīta saṃyogaḥ kārya antara saṃyogāḥ ca iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni  /
dravya guṇa karma vaidharmyāt bhāva abhāva mātram tamaḥ

original: dikkālāv ākāśaṃ ca kriyāvadbhyo vaidharmyān niṣkriyāṇi / KVs_5,2.23 /
analyzed: diś kālau ākāśam ca kriyāvadbhyaḥ vaidharmyāt niṣkriyāṇi  /

original: etena karmāṇi guṇāś ca vyākhyātāḥ / KVs_5,2.24 /

analyzed: na ca asmad buddhibhyaḥ liṅgam ṛṣeḥ
tathā brāhmaṇe saṃjñā karma siddhiḥ liṅgam
tayoḥ kramaḥ yathā anitara itara aṅga bhūtānām
ātma guṇeṣu ātma antara guṇānām akāraṇa tvāt
etena hīna sama viśiṣta dhārmikebhyaḥ parādānam vyākhyātam
samaḥ ātma tyāgaḥ para tyāgaḥ vā
dṛṣṭānām dṛṣṭa prayojanānām dṛṣṭa abhāve prayogaḥ
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanānām dṛṣṭa abhāve prayojanam abhyudayāya
abhiṣecana upavāsa brahmacarya guru kula vāsa vānaprasthya yajña dāna prokṣaṇa diś nakṣatra mantra kāla niyamāḥ ca a dṛṣṭāya
cāturāśramyam upadhāt ca an upadhāt ca  /

original: iṣṭarūparasagandhasparśaṃ prokṣitam abhyukṣitaṃ ca tac chuci / KVs_6,2.6 /
analyzed: iṣṭa rūpa rasa gandha sparśam prokṣitam abhyukṣitam ca tat śuci  /

original: ayatasya śucibhojanād abhyudayo na vidyate yamābhāvāt / KVs_6,2.9 /
analyzed: a yatasya śuci bhojanāt abhyudayaḥ na vidyate yama abhāvāt
vidyate ca anartha antara tvāt yamasya
icchā dveṣa pūrvikā dharma adharmayoḥ pravṛttiḥ

original: idam evaṃguṇam idam evaṃguṇam iti coktam / KVs_7,1.3 /
analyzed: idam evaṃguṇam idam evaṃguṇam iti ca uktam  /
pṛthivyām rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ dravya anitya tvāt anityāḥ

original: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityā dravyanityatvāt / KVs_7,1.8 /
analyzed: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityāḥ dravya nitya tvāt
kāraṇa guṇa pūrvāḥ pṛthivyām pāka jāḥ ca

original: apsu tejasi vāyau ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvāḥ pākajā na vidyante / KVs_7,1.11 /
analyzed: apsu tejasi vāyau ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrvāḥ pāka jāḥ na vidyante  /

original: aguṇavato dravyasya guṇārambhāt karmaguṇā aguṇāḥ / KVs_7,1.12 /
analyzed: aguṇavataḥ dravyasya guṇa ārambhāt karma guṇāḥ aguṇāḥ

original: aṇor mahataś copalabdhyanupalabdhī nitye vyākhyāte / KVs_7,1.15 /
analyzed: aṇoḥ mahataḥ ca upalabdhi anupalabdhī nitye vyākhyāte  /

original: kāraṇabahutvāt kāraṇamahattvāt pracayaviśeṣāc ca mahat / KVs_7,1.16 /
analyzed: kāraṇa bahu tvāt kāraṇa mahā tvāt pracaya viśeṣāt ca mahat

original: aṇu mahad iti tasmin viśeṣabhāvād viśeṣābhāvāc ca / KVs_7,1.18 /
analyzed: aṇu mahat iti tasmin viśeṣa bhāvāt viśeṣa abhāvāt ca
aṇu tva mahā tvayoḥ aṇu tva mahā tva abhāvaḥ karma guṇaiḥ vyākhyātaḥ
aṇu tva mahā tvābhyām karma guṇāḥ aguṇāḥ
etena dīrgha tva hrasva tve vyākhyāte

original: rūparasagandhasparśavyatirekād arthāntaram ekatvaṃ tathā pṛthaktvam / KVs_7,2.1 /
analyzed: rūpa rasa gandha sparśa vyatirekāt artha antaram eka tvam tathā pṛthaktvam

original: tayor nityatvānityatve tejaso rūpasparśābhyāṃ vyākhyāte / KVs_7,2.2 /
analyzed: tayoḥ nitya tva anitya tve tejasaḥ rūpa sparśābhyām vyākhyāte  /

original: niḥsaṃkhyatvāt karmaguṇānāṃ sarvaikatvaṃ na vidyate / KVs_7,2.6 /
analyzed: niḥsaṃkhya tvāt karma guṇānām sarva eka tvam na vidyate
eka tvasya abhāvāt bhāktam na vidyate
kārya kāraṇa ekatva pṛthaktva abhāvāt ekatva pṛthaktve na vidyete  /

original: anyatarakarmaja ubhayakarmajaḥ saṃyogajaś ca saṃyogaḥ / KVs_7,2.10 /
analyzed: anyatara karma jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ saṃyoga jaḥ ca saṃyogaḥ
saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāga abhāvaḥ ṇu tva mahā tvābhyām vyākhyātaḥ

original: yutasiddhyabhāvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete / KVs_7,2.14 /
analyzed: yuta siddhi abhāvāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgau na vidyete  /
asati na asti iti ca prayogāt

original: saṃyogino daṇḍāt samavāyino viṣāṇāc ca / KVs_7,2.20 /

analyzed: eka diś kālābhyām sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭābhyām param aparam
paratva aparatvayoḥ paratva aparatva abhāvaḥ ṇu tva mahā tvābhyām vyākhyātaḥ

original: iheti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ / KVs_7,2.29 /
analyzed: iha iti yatas kārya kāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ
dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva pratiṣedhaḥ bhāvena vyākhyātaḥ

original: guṇakarmasv asannikṛṣṭeṣu jñānaniṣpatter dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ ca / KVs_8.4 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu asannikṛṣṭeṣu jñāna niṣpatteḥ dravyam kāraṇam kāraṇa kāraṇam ca  /

original: sāmānyaviśeṣeṣu sāmānyaviśeṣābhāvāt tata eva jñānam / KVs_8.5 /
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣeṣu sāmānya viśeṣa abhāvāt tatas eva jñānam
sāmānya viśeṣa apekṣam dravya guṇa karmasu

original: guṇakarmasu guṇakarmābhāvad guṇakarmāpekṣaṃ na vidyate / KVs_8.8 /
analyzed: guṇa karmasu guṇa karma abhāvat guṇa karma apekṣam na vidyate

original: samavāyinaḥ śvaityāc chvaityabuddheḥ śvete buddhis te kāryakāraṇabhūte / KVs_8.9 /
analyzed: samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaitya buddheḥ śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte  /
dravyeṣu an itara itara kāraṇāt kāraṇa ayaugapadyāt  /
tathā dravya guṇa karmasu kāraṇa aviśeṣāt

original: ayam eṣa kṛtaṃ tvayā bhojayāinam iti buddhyapekṣaṃ / KVs_8.12 /
analyzed: ayam eṣa kṛtam tvayā iti buddhi apekṣam

original: bhūyastvād gandhavattvāc ca pṛthivī gandhajñāne / KVs_8.16 /
analyzed: bhūyaḥ tvāt gandhavat tvāt ca pṛthivī gandha jñāne

original: tathāpas tejo vāyuś ca rasarūpasparśajñāneṣu rasarūpasparśaviśeṣāt / KVs_8.17 /
analyzed: tathā āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ca rasa rūpa sparśa jñāneṣu rasa rūpa sparśa viśeṣāt
asataḥ sat kriyā guṇa vyapadeśa abhāvāt artha antaram śa bhāvāt

original: yac cānyat satas tad apy asat / KVs_9.5 /
analyzed: yat ca anyat sataḥ tat api asat  /

original: asad iti bhūtapratyakṣābhāvād bhūtasmṛter virodhipratyakṣatvāc ca jñānam / KVs_9.6 /
analyzed: asat iti bhūta pratyakṣa abhāvāt bhūta smṛteḥ virodhi pratyakṣa tvāt ca jñānam
tathā abāve bhāva pratyakṣa tvāt ca
etena a ghaṭaḥ gauḥ adharmaḥ ca vyākhyātaḥ  /

original: nāsti ghaṭo geha iti sato ghaṭasya gehasaṃyogapratiṣedhaḥ / KVs_9.10 /
analyzed: na asti ghaṭaḥ gehe iti sataḥ ghaṭasya geha saṃyoga pratiṣedhaḥ

original: nāsty anyaś candramā iti sāmānyāc candramasaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / KVs_9.11 /
analyzed: na asti anyaḥ candramāḥ iti sāmānyāt candramasaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ  /

original: sad asator vaidharmyāt kārye sad asattā na / KVs_9.12 /
analyzed: sat asatoḥ vaidharmyāt kārye sat asat tā na
ātmani ātma manasoḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt ātma pratyakṣam  /
ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt ca

original: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhy ekārhtasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam / KVs_9.18 /
analyzed: asya idam kāryam kāraṇam saṃbandhi ekārhta samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam  /

original: hetur apadeśo liṅgaṃ nimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāraṇam ity anarthāntaram / KVs_9.20 /
analyzed: hetuḥ apadeśaḥ liṅgam nimittam pramāṇam kāraṇam iti anarthāntaram
asya idam iti buddhi apekṣa tvāt

original: ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt saṃskārāc ca smṛtiḥ / KVs_9.22 /
analyzed: ātma manasoḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt saṃskārāt ca smṛtiḥ  /

original: ātmasamavāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pañcabhyo 'rthāntaratve hetus tadāśrayibhyaś ca guṇebhyaḥ / KVs_10.1 /
analyzed: ātma samavāyaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ pañcabhyaḥ rtha antara tve hetuḥ tad āśrayibhyaḥ ca guṇebhyaḥ  /

original: iṣṭāniṣṭakāraṇaviśeṣād virodhāc ca mithaḥ sukhaduḥkhayor arthāntarabhāvaḥ / KVs_10.2 /
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭa kāraṇa viśeṣāt virodhāt ca mithas sukha duḥkhayoḥ artha antara bhāvaḥ  /

original: saṃśayanirṇayayor arthāntarabhāvaś ca jñānāntaratve hetuḥ / KVs_10.3 /
analyzed: saṃśaya nirṇayayoḥ artha antara bhāvaḥ ca jñāna antara tve hetuḥ

original: tayor niṣpattiḥ pratyakṣalaiṅgikābhyāṃ jñānāntaratve hetuḥ / KVs_10.4 /
analyzed: tayoḥ niṣpattiḥ pratyakṣa laiṅgikābhyām jñāna antara tve hetuḥ
bhaviṣyati iti kārya antare dṛṣṭa tvāt
tathā bhavati iti sa apekṣebhyaḥ napekṣebhyaḥ ca

original: ekārthasamavāyiṣu kāraṇāntareṣu darśanād ekadeśa ity ekasmin / KVs_10.10 /
analyzed: eka artha samavāyiṣu kāraṇa antareṣu darśanāt eka deśaḥ iti ekasmin

original: śiraḥ pṛṣṭham udaraṃ pāṇir iti tadviśeṣebhyaḥ / KVs_10.11 /
analyzed: śiraḥ pṛṣṭham udaram pāṇiḥ iti tad viśeṣebhyaḥ
tathā rūpe kāraṇa kāraṇa samavāyāt ca

original: dṛṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ dṛṣṭābhāve prayogo 'bhyudayāya (S omits dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ) / KVs_10.20 /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānām dṛṣṭa prayojanānām dṛṣṭa abhāve prayogaḥ bhyudayāya dṛṣṭa prayojanānām
tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam iti u
